Package com.scriptrts.game

Class Summary
AnimatedSprite An animated sprite which switches between different images depending on the frame count
Game Game class which stores all information about a currently running game and manages updating and drawing of the map and game features.
GameManager Manages and update units and their positions and statistics
GameObject Unit class which only implements most basic functions.
HeadlessGame Headless game run by the servers and extended by the graphical game
Map Class representing the terrain tiles of a map.
MapGrid Stores the locations of all the units on the map.
Player  
Sprite Sprite, used by units to draw themselves on the game map
Unit Unit object for units on the map
UnitType Unit object for unit types
 

Enum Summary
AttackType Attack types which do different damage to different attributed units
Attribute Attributes possessed by unit which modify the damage dealt by various attacks
Direction Possible directions of movement on the unit grid
SpriteState  
TerrainType Enumeration of all types of terrain that appear on the maps.
UnitClass Represents fundamentally different types of units.
